CustomField.description: This is only used to allow the conversion of Actual Start Time DateTIme field to Date to be allowed to be used in a in the FSL app. Currently FSL does not allow you to explicitly use the DATETIME(value) in the FSL Flow. Used on : GDMFSL ChangeStatusMobileFlow & GDMFSL Complete Work Flows
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Backend use only for GDMFSL ChangeStatusMobileFlow & GDMFSL Complete Work Flows
CustomField.label: Start Travel DateTime To Date
